main event: A civilian observer reported sighting a sharp fire type light in Tucson, Arizona on 10 August 1968 for about 5 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as a stationary sharp fire type light., The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes., The observer was a civilian and the sighting involved only one object., There were 2 confirmed witnesses to the sighting., No physical evidence or photographs were present to support the observation.
witness description: The observer is a civilian aged 37, with an unspecified occupation in real estate.
